attributes.action: Mandate mental health first aiders in work settings.
attributes.additional_details: Ensure there are mental health first aiders ready to react in every work place in the UK.
attributes.background: Make it mandatory to have mental health first aiders in work settings. Mental health first should be equal to physical first aid.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323558
